name: Invite credits
description: Grant starter credits on invite acceptance; record inviter and source.

name: Credit Purchase
description: users can buy credits using real money

name: Creation Detail Related Images
description: images that are similar or related after fold

name: Static Help Pages
description: well-formatted explainers for site features, unprotected route

name: Engagement Emails
description: system fires emails to encourage users to engage, eg. user signed up but hasn't created anything, bundle notifications and send daily reminder where non-zero list

name: Server boosts
description: Server-scoped boosts increase owner's credit yield with caps, no discovery lift.

name: Invites & redemption
description: Optional invite welcome flow via email or shareable token, with stored invite context.
